message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $20,000. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
Alice,  $20,000 is a bit too high for me. I'm really interested in this product, but I can only go up to $12,000.  Let me know what you think.
Bob, I understand your position, but $20,000 is already a very competitive price.  Could you meet me halfway at $16,000?
Alice,  I appreciate you coming down, but $16,000 is still a bit high for me.  How about $14,000? That's a fair compromise and would make this deal work for both of us.
